Lunar Geologic Mapping Program
Lunar Geologic Mapping Program

• Sponsored by NASA Planetary Geology and Geophysics (PGG) program • 30 quadrangle scheme at 1:2,500,000 scale • Pilot program started in 2004 [Gaddis et al., 2004, 2005, 2006]; geologic mapping of Copernicus
• Sponsored by NASA Planetary Geology and Geophysics (PGG) program
• 30 quadrangle scheme at 1:2,500,000 scale
